describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

embedding_conditions.description: Description of embedding conditions and buffers.
embedding_conditions.example: 4% (vol/vol) of 19:1 acrylamide/bis-acrylamide (BioRad), 60 mM Tris⋅HCl pH 8 (Thermo Fisher Scientific), 0.3 M NaCl (Thermo Fisher Scientific), 0.2% (vol/vol) Tetramethylethylenediamine (TEMED) (Sigma)

fiducial_marker.description: Fiducial markers (generally beads) for the alignment of images taken across multiple rounds of imaging.
fiducial_marker.example: 0.1-µm-diameter carboxylate-modified orange fluorescent beads (2% solids, Life Technologies), 1:25,000 dilution

exposure_time.description: Exposure time - as a floating point number - in seconds.

microscope_setup_description.description: Description of the microscope setup including manufacturer and model information about the stand, camera and objective.
microscope_setup_description.example: sCMOS camera (Zyla 4.2; Andor) in combination with a high numerical aperture (NA = 1.3) and objective (UPLSAPO 60 × S2; Olympus)

protocol_type.description: The type of protocol. Must be a child term of https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/efo/terms?iri=http%3A%2F%2Fpurl.obolibrary.org%2Fobo%2FOBI_0000272.
